Uses of Interface
org.apache.mina.protocol.ProtocolAcceptor

Packages that use ProtocolAcceptor
org.apache.mina.protocol.io A wrapper for org.apache.mina.io package to support low-level I/O. 
org.apache.mina.protocol.vmpipe In-VM pipe support which removes the overhead of local loopback communication. 
org.apache.mina.registry A frontend package that makes setting up MINA easier. 
 

Uses of ProtocolAcceptor in org.apache.mina.protocol.io

 class IoProtocolAcceptor
          A ProtocolAcceptor which wraps IoAcceptor to provide low-level I/O.
 

Uses of ProtocolAcceptor in org.apache.mina.protocol.vmpipe
 

Classes in org.apache.mina.protocol.vmpipe that implement ProtocolAcceptor
 class VmPipeAcceptor
          Binds the specified ProtocolProvider to the specified VmPipeAddress.
